programme.desc: Zarul, seorang yang sangat bekerja keras sanggup berniaga ketika sedang belajar kerana ingin menampung pengajiannya. Bapa kepada kekasihnya, Dato' Majid turut membantu perniagaannya. Kekasihnya, Nora yang menuntut di luar negara pulang selepas tamat pengajian namun menemui Zarul yang menghadapi kesukaran dalam pembelajaran dan percintaan.(n)

programme.title: Kad Cinta
programme.desc: TK mencintai Julia, seorang pelajar universiti di Istanbul. Pertemuan mereka di lapangan terbang Istanbul menimbulkan bibit-bibit cinta. Ingin menampung perbelanjaan kajian, TK pulang ke Malaysia dan bekerja sebagai penghantar surat. Ketika menghantar bungkusan, TK bertemu kembali dengan Julia. Sejak itu, Julia sering menerima kad misteri daripada seorang peminat. Berjayakah Julia membongkar persoalan siapakah yang sering menghantar kad misteri tersebut?(n)

programme.title: Putera
programme.desc: Seorang putera raja bernama Hussein menemui cinta bersama seorang gadis biasa. Namun dia dijodohkan bersama Puteri Balqis. Mereka ke Paris namun Hussein terlihat Balqis bermesraan bersama lelaki lain. Bapa Hussein memeberinya masa selama 30 hari untuk mencari calon isteri jika tidak mahu berkahwin dengan Puteri Balqis. Pelbagai halangan terpaksa mereka tempuhi demi mengecapi cinta.(n)

programme.title: Amelia
programme.desc: Amelia menjalinkan hubungan cinta dengan Fandy setelah mereka bertemu secara tidak sengaja di Cameron Highlands. Dalam masa yang sama ibu Amelia ingin menjodohkannya dengan Jefri. Amelia enggan menurut kehendak ibunya kerana Jefri seorang kaki perempuan. Bapa Amelia juga menentang keputusan itu dan bertemu Fandy untuk menceritakan segala yang berlaku. Fandy berasa bersalah kerana menganggap dirinya punca keluarga Amelia berantakan. Fandy mengambil keputusan untuk membawa diri ke luar negara dan hal ini telah menyebabkan Amelia terpaksa mengahwini Jefri. Selepas berkahwin, Amelia dijangkiti HIV daripada suaminya. Apabila Fandy mengetahui keadaan sebenar, dia ingin menebus segala kesalahannya terhadap Amelia.(n)

programme.title: Rozana Cinta 87
programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur menjadi saksi cinta antara Rozana, anak orang berpengaruh dengan seorang pelukis di Pasar Seni yang bernama Din. Rozana mengikuti kelas tarian dan bertemu dengan Nomi. Tanpa disedari, Nomi turut menaruh perasaan terhadap Rozana.(n)

programme.title: Gemerlapan
programme.desc: Mimi mengejutkan ramai pelajar di sebuah kolej berprestij kerana menjadi seorang penggemar muzik dangdut yang tegar. Nel, salah seorang pelajar di situ menganggap muzik dangdut kekampungan dan mereka berdua sering bertengkar kerana hal tersebut. Tetapi tanpa disedari, Nel adalah Mr X yang selama ini merupakan peminat rahsia Mimi dalam diam.(n)

programme.title: Ali Setan 2
programme.desc: Ikatan yang ingin tercipta terpaksa dileraikan kerana campur tangan keluarga menyebabkan Ali dan Asmidar pergi membawa haluan sendiri. Rancangan untuk mendirikan rumahtangga telah diganggu oleh Jeff yang inginkan Asmidar. Ayah Asmidar pula menyuruhnya berkahwin bersama Jeff - namun setelah beberapa bulan mereka pun bercerai kerana tidak bahagia. Ali dan Asmidar pun bersatu semula.(n)

programme.title: Debu Debu Kasih
programme.desc: Suzana baru pulang dari Amerika dengan membawa ijazah dalam bidang muzik. Dia mengikut kawannya Linda untuk bercuti di Terengganu. Di Terengganu, Suzana berkenalan dengan Hassan – seorang pemuda yang suka menghabiskan masa dengan memerhatikan orang di jeti sambil bermain gitar. Suzana akhirnya membantu Hassan sehingga menjadi seorang penyanyi yang berjaya dan telah jatuh cinta dengan Hassan. Namun Suzana telah dikejutkan dengan perubahan sikap Hassan secara tiba-tiba.(n)

programme.title: KLU
programme.desc: Maria, pelajar universiti di luar negara pulang ke tanahair kerana ayahnya yang sakit menyambung semula pelajarannya secara tempatan. Ayah Maria, Datuk Nordin yang sakit telah pun sembuh dan merupakan seorang yang sangat kaya. Mengetahui tentang itu, Tuan Hudson yang semakin muflis mengatur langkah untuk memastikan anaknya, Bob mendekatkan dirinya dengan Maria demi harta.(n)

programme.title: Sate
programme.desc: Milah ialah seorang peniaga sate dan kedai satenya terletak di hadapan bengkel kepunyaan Kadir yang suka melakukan eksperimen aneh. Kadir ingin menyertai Anugerah Saintis untuk memenangi hadiah utama dan sekaligus menyenangkan hidup Milah. Pelbagai rintangan terpaksa dia lalui untuk mencipta mesin miliknya dan akhirnya Kadir berjaya menyiapkan mesin tersebut dan menyertai pertandingan itu.(n)

programme.title: Hanny
programme.desc: Cinta Hanny dan Jeff dihalang oleh ayahnya, Dato’ Mansor. Hanny pulang ke kampung bapanya dan ditunangkan dengan Faizal. Jeff memberontak dan hidup sendiri dengan mengambil upah membawa teksi setelah keluar daripada rumahnya apabila Dato’ Mansor ingin menjodohkannya dengan Maria.Sofea yang juga kakak kepada Jeff telah mengupah seorang wanita bernama Sheila untuk mengintip perhubungan Jeff dan Hanny dan merosakkan hubungan mereka. Apakah kesudahan hubungan mereka berdua.(n)

programme.title: Bisikan Remaja
programme.desc: Ameera yang baru berpindah dari Sabah ke Kuala Lumpur bersekolah di kolej swasta, dan dipilih sebagai ketua kelas. Rakan-rakan Daniel bagaimanapun merasakan bahawa Daniel, sebagai ahli sukan kolej, lebih layak untuk jawatan itu. Ketidakpuasan hati ini memecahkan kelas kepada dua puak. Ameera semakin popular kerana kecantikan, kecerdasan dan personalitinya. Daniel membuat taruhan dengan rakan-rakannya, bahawa dia akan dapat memenangi hati Ameera dalam masa dua minggu. Apabila Ameera mengetahui tentang pertaruhan itu, dia dan Daniel menjadi musuh, walaupun telah membina perasaan bersama antara satu sama lain.(n)

programme.title: Ali Setan 2

programme.desc: Even Heroes Have Their Own Problems - Valentine’s Day has come. Gintoki and Shinpachi say they don’t care receiving chocolate but long to get one.(n)

programme.desc: When You Are Sitting On The Train, Both Hands Must Be Strapped - Hasegawa finally gets a job. So, he wants to restore his relationship with his wife who lives separately from him.(n)

programme.desc: Runaway Girl! The Forest Of The Kinoko - Miyabi argues with her mother, runs away from home, and gets lost in a forest where Kinokos, the forest elves, live.(n)

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Inheritance: The Necklace Of Death - Tsunade proposed an idea to Naruto, that if he can master the technique of Rasengan in a week, she will give him her necklace.(n)

programme.title: Naruto

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton.(n)

programme.title: Sensasi Bola
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.(n)

programme.title: 2022 Pertamina Grand Prix of Indonesia Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - he Pertamina Grand Prix of Indonesia MotoGP race in Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara (NTB), is ready to be held. The racers are ready to compete in the biggest motorcycle racing event in the world. Pertamina has made various preparations ahead of the competition, which will start on March 19-20,2022, at the Pertamina Mandalika International Street Circuit, Lombok, West Nusa Tenggara (NTB). One of them is presenting several official merchandise outlets to excite the Pertamina Grand Prix of Indonesia event.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on February 5 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent top prospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Main Event - UFC Fight Night: Strickland vs. Imavov (also known as UFC Fight Night 217) is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that will take place on January 15, 2023, at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Lewis vs. Spivac
programme.desc: Prelims - After quietly working his way up the heavyweight ranks, Moldova’s Serghei Spivac smashed his way into the Top 15 with finishes of Greg Hardy and Augusto Sakai, and now the “Polar Bear” aims for even greater heights when he faces the UFC’s Knockout King, Derrick Lewis, in the main event of UFC Fight Night on February 5 at the APEX in Las Vegas. One of the best heavyweights of his era, Lewis has sent top prospects like Chris Daukaus and Curtis Blaydes crashing to defeat, and he has similar plans for Spivac in this pivotal showdown.(n)

programme.title: 2022 Marathon Valencia
programme.desc: 2022 Marathon Valencia - The historical city of Valencia, Spain will play host to some of the best athletes on the internationl scene for the 2022 Marathon Valencia.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Murder in the Old Country
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping from a lab technician who was found guilty of the murder of his lab assistant, Inspector Sarah Kohr has to track him down. But the killer is wanted by another assassin, linked to a scandal far greater than Sarah imagined.(n)

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.(n)

programme.title: Angpao
programme.desc: Michael competes with his brother to get the most Angpaos for Chinese New Year but is one-upped by his brother who received extras from a mysterious man. To beat his rival, Michael must find a way to get Angpaos from the mysterious man too.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Misplanner
programme.desc: Two in-laws have clashing ideas on the best wedding arrangement for their engaged children. Claudia, the groom’s mother, wants a small intimate affair while Herb, the bride’s father, wants a pompous ceremony. Peace is shattered, and all hell breaks loose.(n)

programme.title: Keeper
programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.(n)

programme.title: Roxanne
programme.desc: Twenty years after the Romanian Revolution, Tavi finds out from his secret police file that he might have a son he had not known about. In his search for the truth, Tavi gets caught up in his complicated past which threatens to mess up his current life.(n)

programme.title: Cookbook of Love
programme.desc: Jule, a culinary lover, is planning a big move to New York to join her boyfriend, Ole. Her mother tries to stop her from leaving and resorts to creative tactics – not least, bribing a TV chef to “steal” her heart through cooking.(n)

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: A teenager’s web of lies blows up in her face and threatens to destroy the lives of her older sister and mother. As the two siblings desperately try to clean up her mess, they find out the truth about their mother.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil’s Moor
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.(n)

programme.title: Keeper
programme.desc: Maxime and Mélanie are 15 and in love with each other. One day, Mélanie learns that she is pregnant, and after much convincing from Maxine, they decide to become parents.(n)

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Town Anthology
programme.desc: Set in a small town in Quebec, the film centres on the inhabitants of the town who are struggling to cope after teenager Simon Dubé is killed in a car accident. As the family and town grieve, the residents begin to report several ghost sightings.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Girl Gone Missing
programme.desc: Public Prosecutor Mehringer has been dealt a tough hand in his case against the Ukrainian arms trafficker Artem Lazarev: his most important witness is supposed to die. Investigator Sarah Kohr helps to stage the witness’ death, but all is not as they seem.(n)

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail….(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Devil’s Moor
programme.desc: While driving with her mother, detective Sarah Kohr witnesses a robbery at a gas station and intervenes. After subduing the perpetrator who turns out to be just a 15-year-old, she has to investigate how he was able to get his hand on a live weapon.(n)

programme.title: A Song For Mia
programme.desc: Sebastian is a young man living a life of wanton indulgence until an accident blinds him and halts his life abruptly. Mia, a nurse unlike his usual women, enters his life and shows him the beauty of a life he can attain if he follows his true passions.(n)

programme.title: Black Snow
programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Runner
programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.(n)

programme.title: Cookbook of Love
programme.desc: Jule, a culinary lover, is planning a big move to New York to join her boyfriend, Ole. Her mother tries to stop her from leaving and resorts to creative tactics – not least, bribing a TV chef to “steal” her heart through cooking.(n)

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: A teenager’s web of lies blows up in her face and threatens to destroy the lives of her older sister and mother. As the two siblings desperately try to clean up her mess, they find out the truth about their mother.(n)

programme.title: Blood Pressure
programme.desc: Nicole, a 41-year-old wife bored with her mundane life, receives letters from a mysterious observer. Enticed, she plays along but they soon get out of hand and threaten to tear apart her relationship with her husband and two teenage children.(n)

programme.title: Garden Lane
programme.desc: Eric and Elin were both children to drug addict parents and had traumatic childhoods. As adults, they serendipitously meet at a funeral. As they relive the ghosts of their past, they struggle to find strength in one another as they once did as kids.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Ward
programme.desc: It is no coincidence that detective Sarah Kohr intervenes when the life-threatening attack on a Chinese businessman in Hamburg completely overwhelms his bodyguards. Sarah knows that her former colleague Lanz was behind it, but she needs to find out why.(n)

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail….(n)

programme.title: A Song For Mia
programme.desc: Sebastian is a young man living a life of wanton indulgence until an accident blinds him and halts his life abruptly. Mia, a nurse unlike his usual women, enters his life and shows him the beauty of a life he can attain if he follows his true passions.(n)

programme.title: Midnight Runner
programme.desc: A true story. Jonas is one of the top runners in Switzerland. He is also a talented chef and plans to move in with Simone. But Jonas is increasingly tormented by dreams of his late brother. He begins to lead a tragic double life to overcome his despair.(n)

programme.title: The Boss And The Cutie

programme.title: In Love With My Boss
programme.desc: Anna is secretly in love with her boss Sven, who seems to think no more of Anna than a perfect assistant. When Sven decides to pursue love, Anna conceals her affection and plays matchmaker. Yet, her success in the matter leaves her heartbroken.(n)

programme.title: Blood Pressure

programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.(n)

programme.desc: When Pilates trainer Kathrin needs a new kidney, her husband’s hesitation to be her donor results in a crisis in their marriage. Faced with issues of life and death, the fragility of the couple’s relationship is laid bare.(n)

programme.title: Angpao
programme.desc: Michael competes with his brother to get the most Angpaos for Chinese New Year but is one-upped by his brother who received extras from a mysterious man. To beat his rival, Michael must find a way to get Angpaos from the mysterious man too.(n)

programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his family-owned crystal factory – a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.(n)

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.(n)

programme.title: The Best Of Dorien B.
programme.desc: 37-year old Dorien seemed to have a perfect life - she has a flourishing veterinary practice, two sweet kids and a successful husband. After everything suddenly fell apart, she must rediscover herself in order to escape the chaos which is now her life.(n)

programme.title: The Daddy Offensive
programme.desc: Markus, who has always wanted a family, is overjoyed when his holiday fling Lena becomes pregnant. Her father strongly disapproves of him and when he turns up for his birthday, a hilarious showdown ensues between Markus and his future father-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.(n)

programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.(n)

programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.(n)

programme.desc: The owner of the historic Sylt company Betten-Reuter, is found dead and two infamous Santa Clauses are believed to have silenced him. Known for robbery, is the notorious pair really also capable of murder?(n)

programme.desc: Gosha is a trucker in northern Yakutia, who supplies his community with food, alongside low quality vodka which contributes to their alcoholism. When his truck breaks down during one of his trips, he finds himself alone in the wilderness.(n)

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And The Silent Night

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: The Last Star Witness - Escape to the Alps
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a man she wrongly thought was about to attack her, a traumatised Sarah Kohr is sent away on leave to forget the ordeal. But when she witnesses a man being shot at the airport, she has to help his son flee from the unknown killer.(n)

programme.title: Top End Wedding
programme.desc: Newly engaged couple Lauren and Ned are excited to plan for their dream wedding. But there’s one big problem – Lauren’s mother has just vanished. They embark on an epic road trip across Northern Australia in search of her.(n)

programme.title: Because Of You
programme.desc: Farhaan storms out of the house after an argument with his girlfriend Maya. As they try to understand one another so that they can reconcile, they are made to face their flaws and work through the conflict.(n)

programme.title: Road to Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his father’s funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.(n)

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.(n)

programme.title: Watchtower
programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.(n)

programme.title: Nanny On Board: In Mauritius
programme.desc: Henni is 60 years old, fun-loving and strong-willed. However, burdened with financial woes, she decides to be a nanny despite her lack of experience. Soon, she lands her first job offer from Waldner, a widowed father with two daughters, in Mauritius.(n)

programme.title: Reunited
programme.desc: Two children live alone in Turkey. They are Syrian refugees whose parents are in Denmark and Canada, trapped in a bureaucratic system which reduces their interactions to Skype calls. Will they succeed in reuniting with their family?(n)

programme.title: Because Of You
programme.desc: Farhaan storms out of the house after an argument with his girlfriend Maya. As they try to understand one another so that they can reconcile, they are made to face their flaws and work through the conflict.(n)

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Murder in the Old Country
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping from a lab technician who was found guilty of the murder of his lab assistant, Inspector Sarah Kohr has to track him down. But the killer is wanted by another assassin, linked to a scandal far greater than Sarah imagined.(n)

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.(n)

programme.title: Nanny On Board II: In South Africa
programme.desc: Henni, as the premium nanny, finds herself in a South African farm. Her employer is Konrad, a harsh grandfather. However, she soon discovers that beneath his cold exterior is a sensitive man with a wounded heart. She falls for him and things soon unravel.(n)

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.(n)

programme.title: Kitwana
programme.desc: As a foreigner living in Malaysia, Kitwana is torn between settling down in Malaysia or his home country. Between his mother and his fiancé, he has to make a difficult choice.(n)

programme.title: The Bride In Red
programme.desc: In a bid to scam their guests off their gifts of cash, Roberta and Leòn enlist the help of Roberta’s non-conformist aunt to stage a fake wedding . However, they need to navigate the obstacle that is Roberta’s eccentric family for the scheme to work.(n)

programme.title: Rabbit Without Ears
programme.desc: Til Schweiger (Inglorious Bastards) directs and stars in this slick romantic comedy that was number 1 on the German box office in 2007. A reporter is at the mercy of the girl he used to bully in school while serving his probation at a daycare centre.(n)

programme.title: My Tsadis Bos Jauh Di Hati Dekat Di Jodoh
programme.desc: Anak Rei, Devon cukup aktif dan sering membuatkan Rei berasa tertekan dalam menguruskannya. Pada suatu hari, dia berselisih faham dengan seorang wanita bernama Rima, seorang pakar psikologi kanak-kanak. Adakah salah faham ini akan berkembang menjadi cinta?(n)

programme.title: Dewi Rindu
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.(n)

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.(n)

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Aku Jadi Penghulu Temanku Dan Mantan Pacarku
programme.desc: Mampukah Yuda memaafkan bekas kekasihnya yang bakal berkahwin dengan kawannya sendiri?(n)

programme.title: The Sultan S2
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.(n)

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.(n)

programme.title: The Sultan S2
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.(n)

programme.title: BUSER Investigasi
programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.(n)

programme.title: Aku Jadi Penghulu Temanku Dan Mantan Pacarku
programme.desc: Mampukah Yuda memaafkan bekas kekasihnya yang bakal berkahwin dengan kawannya sendiri?(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.(n)

programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. programme.title: Demi Oppa Ganteng Dari Korya
programme.desc: Cila tergila-gilakan Oppa Korea. Sebagai peminat tegar, dia sukar untuk mencari jodoh. Namun, apabila dia bertemu dengan Dudun, seorang tukang penyapu jalanan, dia amat menyukainya kerana dia kelihatan seperti Oppa Korea!(n)

programme.title: Kisah Guru Honorer Yang Berikrar Membangun Sekolah Gratis
programme.desc: Ika menolak sekeras-kerasnya permintaan Marwan untuk membeli tanah sekolahnya untuk dijadikan pusat beli-belah. Memandangkan dia menolak, Marwan melakukan apa sahaja untuk mendapatkan tanah sekolah itu daripada Ika.(n)

programme.title: D'Academy 5
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.(n)

Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.(n)

programme.title: D'Academy 5
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.(n)

programme.title: Kisah Guru Honorer Yang Berikrar Membangun Sekolah Gratis
programme.desc: Ika menolak sekeras-kerasnya permintaan Marwan untuk membeli tanah sekolahnya untuk dijadikan pusat beli-belah. Memandangkan dia menolak, Marwan melakukan apa sahaja untuk mendapatkan tanah sekolah itu daripada Ika.(n)

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.(n)

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.(n)

programme.title: Cinta Misteri
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.(n)

programme.title: Calon Presiden
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. programme.title: Dewi Rindu
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.(n)

programme.title: Dari Anak Penjual Papeda Keliling Menjadi Manager Sukses
programme.desc: Firman menerima biasiswa di universiti terkenal, tetapi dia terpaksa membayar separuh daripada jumlah itu, yang merupakan jumlah yang agak besar baginya. Firman tertanya-tanya sama ada bapanya, seorang penjual Papeda, mampu membiayai pengajiannya.(n)

programme.title: Jejak Misteri
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.(n)

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.(n)

programme.title: Dari Anak Penjual Papeda Keliling Menjadi Manager Sukses
programme.desc: Firman menerima biasiswa di universiti terkenal, tetapi dia terpaksa membayar separuh daripada jumlah itu, yang merupakan jumlah yang agak besar baginya. Firman tertanya-tanya sama ada bapanya, seorang penjual Papeda, mampu membiayai pengajiannya.(n)

programme.title: Aku Jadi Penghulu Temanku Dan Mantan Pacarku
programme.desc: Mampukah Yuda memaafkan bekas kekasihnya yang bakal berkahwin dengan kawannya sendiri?(n)

programme.title: Demi Oppa Ganteng Dari Korya
programme.desc: Cila tergila-gilakan Oppa Korea. Sebagai peminat tegar, dia sukar untuk mencari jodoh. Namun, apabila dia bertemu dengan Dudun, seorang tukang penyapu jalanan, dia amat menyukainya kerana dia kelihatan seperti Oppa Korea!(n)

programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. programme.title: Bake Off - The Professionals (S4)
programme.desc: The Finals - The teams pour all of their patisserie passion and prowess into creating chocolate hats and a banquet fit for an awards ceremony. Who will be crowned the winner?(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2)
programme.desc: On a visit to a dairy, Rick meets a man who is paid to eat 700 samples of cheese a week and cooks his sumptuous cheese and chive scones. His next stop is the salty old fishing town of Newlyn, the unlikely setting of one of Britain's most revolutionary art movements. Rick discovers an intriguing tale of deception behind one of the most famous paintings produced here.(n)

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down (S4)
programme.desc: It's Terracotta Week and the remaining potters are tasked with making their own range of cookware, before judge Rich Miller sets a second terracotta challenge to engrave tiles.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S6)
programme.desc: The eight remaining sewers return to the sewing room for lingerie and sleepwear week.(n)

programme.title: Grand Designs (S19)
programme.desc: Kinross - Only a few lucky residents get to live in the highly decorative Arts and Crafts houses of a nineteenth century country estate in the midst of the dramatic Scottish countryside. But what if an outsider wants to come in and plonk an enormous black minimalist rectangular building right into the beautiful walled garden?(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat (S1)
programme.desc: Special Occasions - Rachel celebrates the indulgent side of chocolate. She creates a luxurious chocolate mousse with a twist, and adds a chocolatey take to a pasta dish, cacio e pepe.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S6)
programme.desc: For reduce, reuse and recycle week, all the fabric in the haberdashery is replaced with charity shop clothes and soft furnishings.(n)

programme.title: Michela's Classic Italian (S1)
programme.desc: Nowadays, Italian staples such as bruschetta, linguine and pesto are loved worldwide. Michela Chiappa shows us how to cook the very best Italian food.(n)

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1)
programme.desc: The remaining five cooks create two dishes that are judged on how they look when professionally photographed and how they rate on Jamie's social media snap poll.(n)

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S6)
programme.desc: It's Cake Day for the first heat of eight junior bakers as they enter the tent for two exciting challenges: sponge baking and jelly making as they make fantasy cakes themed around their wildest dreams!(n)

programme.desc: Chester and Banbury - In this episode, George attempts to bring the grandeur back to a Georgian town house in Cheshire that's been stripped of its original features, and tackles a 380-year-old Jacobean cottage.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home (S8)
programme.desc: Chester and Banbury - In this episode, George attempts to bring the grandeur back to a Georgian town house in Cheshire that's been stripped of its original features, and tackles a 380-year-old Jacobean cottage.(n)

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver (S1)
programme.desc: The remaining five cooks create two dishes that are judged on how they look when professionally photographed and how they rate on Jamie's social media snap poll.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee (S6)
programme.desc: For reduce, reuse and recycle week, all the fabric in the haberdashery is replaced with charity shop clothes and soft furnishings.(n)

programme.title: Junior Bake Off (S6)
programme.desc: It's Cake Day for the first heat of eight junior bakers as they enter the tent for two exciting challenges: sponge baking and jelly making as they make fantasy cakes themed around their wildest dreams!(n)

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4)
programme.desc: Qasr Al Sarab, Abu Dhabi - Surrounded as far as they eye can see by vast sand dunes and scorching heat, guests relax in palatial comfort with swimming pools, huge baths and lush gardens. Giles and Monica explore how all this water use is made possible and meet the staff who are coping with living and providing hotel service in such an extreme environment.(n)

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby (S4)
programme.desc: The Lanesborough, London - In the final episode of the series Monica Galetti and Giles Coren visit The Lanesborough in London, the first time the hotel has allowed cameras to film behind the scenes. Set discreetly in a historic building on London's Hyde Park Corner, suites are often rented for months at a time and every room comes with 24-hour dedicated butler ​service. ​Despite its extreme luxury, Giles and Monica discover a friendly staff that make staying at The Lanesborough feel like being home from home for their wealthy and famous guests.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall (S2)
programme.desc: Rick's in Falmouth, seeing the seas around Cornwall which inspired author William Golding to write Lord of the Flies, and meets his daughter, Judy. programme.desc: Mengisahkan Amin yang bekerja di sebuah kilang terpikat dengan Aida yang berasal dari Kelantan selepas mereka terlanggar di tempat kerja. Apabila Amin semakin mesra dengan Aida, dia didampingi Iqbal yang mengugutnya supaya menjauhi Aida. Mira yang merupakan jiran kepada Amin sebenarnya jatuh hati dengannya. Hari-hari Mira cuba mengambil hati mak dan ayah Amin dengan memberi kuih. Siapakah yang akan menjadi pilihan Amin?(n)
